  • become better informed on the Student Services initiative design project within Operational Excellence (OE)
  • exchange information on developments within the OE Student Services initiative
  • share how each of us can get involved (without having to commit 40% time)
  • advocate for an informed solution design
We look forward to your participation in this open exchange!","shortDescription":"We have set-up this site to help the wide range of students services representatives to: * become better informed on the Student Services initiative design project within Operational Excellence (OE) * exchange information on developments within the OE Student Services initiative * share how each of us can get involved (without having to commit 40% time) * advocate for an informed solution design We look forward to your participation in this open exchange!"},{"title":"OHOH 001 001 Sp06","id":"9f3a1046-fa6d-4778-0058-64f3c8bf66a2","url":"https://sakai-dev.berkeley.edu/portal/site/9f3a1046-fa6d-4778-0058-64f3c8bf66a2"},{"title":"Online Course Evaluation WG","id":"a13031d2-666e-4adf-807e-8d3ed3360d05","url":"https://sakai-dev.berkeley.edu/portal/site/a13031d2-666e-4adf-807e-8d3ed3360d05","description":"On February 25, 2010, VP Koshland charged the Online Course Evaluation Working Group.
